header.title: MCP info on index
header.description: Adds a red box to the index when there are reported or unapproved posts (and how many). So you don't have to check the MCP everytime and you will see reports and unapproved posts faster. This is only visible for moderators or admins with moderator permissions.
header.author-notes: To install this MOD on a subsilver2 based style. Only apply changes to index.php and language/en/mcp.php and then go to the subsilver2 file which is displayed below at Additional MODX Files

changelog.change: Added if (!function_exists('get_forum_list')) to avoid problems with other MODs
Seperated the unapproved Topics and Posts counters
